org.javacogs
Class ConfirmDialog

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.javacogs.ConfirmDialog
public class ConfirmDialog
extends java.lang.Object

ConfirmDialog is a wrapper for JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog that does word wrapping.

Author:
Thornton Rose

show

public static int show(java.awt.Container parent,
                       java.lang.String message)
Show a confirm dialog (message type = JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE, option type = JOptionPane.YES_NO_OPTION).
Parameters:
parent - Parent container.

show

public static int show(java.awt.Container parent,
                       java.lang.String message,
                       java.lang.String title,
                       int optionType)
Show a confirm dialog (message type = JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE).
Parameters:
parent - Parent container.
title - Dialog title.
message - Message to display.
optionType - Response option type (use constants in JOptionPane).
Returns:
Selected option.
